001package com.technototes.library.hardware.servo;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.ElapsedTime;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range;
005
006public class ServoProfiler {
007    private final Servo servo;
008    private double maxVel, maxAccel, targetPosition, servoRange, targetTolerance;
009    private final ElapsedTime deltaTime;
010    private double delta;
011    private double proportion;
012
013    public static class Constraints {
014
015        public double maxVelocity, maxAcceleration, proportion;
016
017        public Constraints(double vel, double accel, double prop) {
018            maxVelocity = vel;
019            maxAcceleration = accel;
020            proportion = prop;
021        }
022
023        public double getMaxVelocity() {
024            return maxVelocity;
025        }
026
027        public double getMaxAcceleration() {
028            return maxAcceleration;
029        }
030
031        public double getProportion() {
032            return proportion;
033        }
034    }
035
036    public ServoProfiler(Servo s) {
037        servo = s;
038        setServoRange(0.75);
039        setTargetTolerance(0.01);
040        deltaTime = new ElapsedTime();
041        delta = 0;
042    }
043
044    public ServoProfiler setConstraints(double vel, double accel, double prop) {
045        maxVel = vel;
046        maxAccel = accel;
047        proportion = prop;
048        return this;
049    }
050
051    public ServoProfiler setConstraints(Constraints c) {
052        return setConstraints(c.maxVelocity, c.maxAcceleration, c.proportion);
053    }
054
055    public ServoProfiler setServoRange(double rangeInRotations) {
056        servoRange = rangeInRotations;
057        return this;
058    }
059
060    public ServoProfiler setTargetPosition(double target) {
061        targetPosition = target;
062        deltaTime.reset();
063        return this;
064    }
065
066    public ServoProfiler translateTargetPosition(double translation) {
067        return setTargetPosition(Range.clip(0, targetPosition + translation, 1));
068    }
069
070    public ServoProfiler setTargetTolerance(double tolerance) {
071        targetTolerance = tolerance;
072        return this;
073    }
074    // fun method to update servo
075    public ServoProfiler update() {
076        // if at the target dont do anything
077        if (isAtTarget()) return this;
078        // set the past delta pos
079        double pastDelta = delta;
080        // get the change in time, then reset the timer instantly
081        double deltaSec = deltaTime.seconds();
082        deltaTime.reset();
083
084        // generate the new change in servo pos.
085        // range.clip makes the change fit the max constraints
086        // the min and max make sure both constraints are hit
087        // the deltasec makes it independent of looptime
088        delta = Range.clip(
089                deltaSec * servoRange * proportion * (getTargetPosition() - getCurrentPosition()),
090                Math.max(pastDelta - maxAccel * deltaSec, -maxVel * deltaSec),
091                Math.min(pastDelta + maxAccel * deltaSec, maxVel * deltaSec));
092        servo.setPosition(getCurrentPosition() + delta / servoRange);
093
094        return this;
095    }
096
097    public boolean isAtTarget() {
098        return Math.abs(getCurrentPosition() - getTargetPosition()) < targetTolerance;
099    }
100
101    public double getCurrentPosition() {
102        return servo.getPosition();
103    }
104
105    public Servo getServo() {
106        return servo;
107    }
108
109    public double getMaxVel() {
110        return maxVel;
111    }
112
113    public double getMaxAccel() {
114        return maxAccel;
115    }
116
117    public double getTargetPosition() {
118        return targetPosition;
119    }
120
121    public double getTargetTolerance() {
122        return targetTolerance;
123    }
124}
